title: Tour de France Femmes unsung heroes: Jess Allen on being the human yo-yo and her first $0 contract
content:
Since signing her first 'pro' contract in 2013 for no salary, Allen has become one of the most reliable domestiques in the bunch.

Read the full article at Tour de France Femmes unsung heroes: Jess Allen on being the human yo-yo and her first $0 contract on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
